details.title: Development of THz Gyrotrons at IAP RAS and FIR UF and Their Applications in Physical Research and High-Power THz Technologies
details.abstract: In this paper, we present some of the most significant recent results that characterize the state of the art in the development of sub-THz and THz gyrotrons at IAP-RAS and FIR-UF after 15 years of collaboration as well as their applications in various novel and prospective research fields and advanced technologies.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society

keywords: Coherent RF sources by intense electron beams
